pages.text: Most recipes in your pedestal require Gemstone Powder as a source of magical energy.$(br2)Gemstone Powder comes in various colors and can be acquired by pulverizing gemstone shards via $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Anvil Crushing$().

pages.title: Mixing Colors
pages.text: There is nothing more important to an upcoming artist than mixing the right paint.$(br)Unfortunately, you found that in the case of Gemstone Powder, its not nearly as easy as it initially seemed: The powders don't quite want to mix. The result is always just a multicolored mass.$(br2)Maybe you can come up with something later?
